job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you passionate about leveraging AI to revolutionize customer interactions? We are looking for a Prompt Engineer to join a dynamic, forward-thinking team dedicated to developing cutting-edge AI assistants for our client.
       Your expertise will play a crucial role in streamlining administrative tasks, enabling advisors to focus on what truly matters-delivering outstanding customer service.

     * Collaborate in an Agile scrum team to design and implement scalable GenAI solutions that enhance both customer experience and advisor efficiency.
     * Develop advanced AI assistant technologies, utilizing your expertise in AI architectures and Prompt Engineering.
     * Conduct rigorous testing and validation to ensure high-quality, reliable AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Prompt Engineer

Are you passionate about leveraging AI to revolutionize customer interactions? We are looking for a Prompt Engineer to join a dynamic, forward-thinking team dedicated to developing cutting-edge AI assistants for our client.
       Your expertise will play a crucial role in streamlining administrative tasks, enabling advisors to focus on what truly matters-delivering outstanding customer service.

     * Collaborate in an Agile scrum team to design and implement scalable GenAI solutions that enhance both customer experience and advisor efficiency.
     * Develop advanced AI assistant technologies, utilizing your expertise in AI architectures and Prompt Engineering.
     * Conduct rigorous testing and validation to ensure high-quality, reliable AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes designing and implementing GenAI solutions, developing advanced AI assistant technologies using prompt engineering, and collaborating within an Agile team. This aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on generative models and application development.

job_tasks.phrase: streamlining administrative tasks, enabling advisors to focus on what truly matters-delivering outstanding customer service
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the business goal of the AI assistant, which is to improve efficiency and customer service, demonstrating an understanding of the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: design and implement scalable GenAI solutions
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation and deployment of Generative AI solutions, which falls under the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop advanced AI assistant technologies, utilizing your expertise in AI architectures and Prompt Engineering
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the core activity of developing and fine-tuning AI models, specifically focusing on prompt engineering and AI architectures, which is central to generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: design and implement scalable GenAI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Implementing solutions implies building and integrating them into a system, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate in an Agile scrum team
job_tasks.justification: Working within an Agile scrum team is a common practice in software development, indicating a focus on iterative development and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct rigorous testing and validation to ensure high-quality, reliable AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Testing and validation are crucial steps in ensuring the quality and reliability of AI solutions before and during production, which is a key aspect of MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate in an Agile scrum team
streamlining administrative tasks, enabling advisors to focus on what truly matters-delivering outstanding customer service
